title: Bundesliga top four make 20m euro cash pledge to other German clubs
description: The Bundesliga's four Champions League clubs pledge 20m euros to support fellow German teams during the coronavirus.
content:
Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are two of the biggest clubs in Germany
The four Bundesliga clubs in this season's Champions League have pledged 20m euros (£18.3m) to support fellow German teams during the coronavirus.
Bayern Munich, Borussia Dortmund, … [+1867 chars]
